thread.title: Deutsche Bank Increases Its Bonus Pool

author: Jenny Strasburg
title: Deutsche Bank Increases Its Bonus Pool
text:
Bonuses are surging back at Deutsche Bank AG, except for its top bosses.
After three consecutive years without a profit, the German lender disclosed Friday that employees will get €2.2 billion ($2.71 billion) in variable pay for 2017, in addition to their fixed salaries. That is more than quadruple the previous year’s bonus pool.
Top executives... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
